name: Divey
description:
Divey is a game where you have to manage your submarine's power systems (two massive batteries) by charging them in random abandoned underwater observatories.

Joystick walks if you're on land, if you're in water, hold grip when doing a stroke, release it when pushing your hand forward. Physical swimming!

You grab stuff with the trigger, except for the submarine controller, which you grab and hold with grip buttons.

Originally designed with Index controllers in mind, but bindings are set up for all the other devices.
